metadata.description: It's three times the ACTION, three times the THRILLS, and three times the DANGER!!!  Abbey, Sydney and Sonya embark on three different knuckle-clenching adventures, each an epic tale of intrigue and derring-do, and each drawn by a different fantastic artist--It's a triple-play of danger that will climax with the biggest surprise of the year!
metadata.name: Danger Girl: Trinity
